activities:
We are a company focused on providing world class Systems Automation, Operations, Security Architecture and Information Assurance.

Please see our full privacy policy describing our activities and process posted on our website at: http://www.newcontext.com established 1/17/2014 (updated 1/28/2014). We include information on how to contact New Context and our third-party arbitration organization, the BBB, within our privacy policy. We have also updated our privacy policy per instructions from your DOC Safe Harbor office regarding explicitly stating our Privacy Policy on our website (new location: mainpage).
